DOC.brief_summary: Hemostasis will be achieved during Pediatric Tonsillectomy/Adenoidectomy with the use of QuickClot.
DOC.brief_title: Safety Study of Quickclot for Bleeding Control After Adenotonsillectomy
DOC.detailed_description: The Quickclot dressing contains Kaolin, a natural mineral that promotes the body's clotting process. This dressing will be applied for one minute to the area where the tonsils/adenoids were. The investigators are hoping to develop a standard of practice where Quickclot is a key addition for tonsillectomy surgery.
DOC.criteria: diagnosis of adenotonsillar hypertrophy causing obstructive sleep disorders Patients with signs or symptoms of obstructed breathing recurrent pharyngitis history of bleeding disorder history of prior adenotonsillectomy
